mapper.select:
select mopID name,SUM(mopMoney) value
from res_mop
stationId IN #{item}
and
minutes between DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') and DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
group by 1
